title: DPS BestOf
itunes:title: DPS BestOf
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the weekend in sport and discusses why the show was off air yesterday. Mike Florio calls in to react to Tom Brady's new gig as Fox's new lead NFL Analyst. And Reggie Miller talks about confrontations between fans and players on the heels of the Chris Paul situation with his family.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
